name: Chicken Control
description:
This is no ordinary platformer. Sure you run around in 2D, jump and climb up ladders. Sometimes you even have to avoid some spikes.  This game is different. The mechanics of this game are out of control. Sure you can try and nudge a chicken here and there to control gravity or to allow you to pass through lasers, but the chickens go where the chickens want to go.

No Chickens were harmed in the making of this game.
